name: Kazap.io
description:
KAZAP.IO - A fast-paced multiplayer arena shooter! 

Collect orbs and grow. Get larger, tougher, and see farther than other players, sniping them with ultra-powerful blasts. 

Beware though, small players with skills can get past your defensive blast and score hits to your hull! Thrust, drift, fire to get an angle on larger players.

Fight among asteroids and black holes. Get top score, unlock new ships!

WASD or arrow keys (↑←↓→) to control your ship.

X or K to fire, Z or L hits the brakes.

NOTE: To Unlock edit mode you must first click a social media link, then click around the page or refresh to activate the control.
